has research problem: Message - level and Topic - based Sentiment Analysis

has research problem.from sentence: DataStories at SemEval-2017 Task 4 : Deep LSTM with Attention for Message - level and Topic - based Sentiment Analysis
In this paper we present two deep - learning systems that competed at SemEval - 2017 Task 4 " Sentiment Analysis in Twitter " .
Sentiment analysis is an area in Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) , studying the identification and quantification of the sentiment expressed in text .
